summary: Comprehensive e2e testing completed for Wachau Gold premium wine shop e-commerce application. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working correctly with multilingual support, cart functionality, admin panel, and order management system.

minor_issues.issue: Initial login fails when admin user doesn't exist yet
Mobile menu button not found with standard selectors
minor_issues.impact: May use different mobile navigation approach

passed_tests: All product API endpoints (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Product filtering by category and featured status
Product detail retrieval by slug and ID
Homepage loads with hero section and featured products
Shop page with category filters (Alle Produkte, Liköre, Edelbrände, Geschenksets)
Product detail page with add to cart functionality
Shopping cart with quantity controls and item management
Checkout form submission and order creation
Order tracking page with search functionality
Admin order management and status updates
